scripts.test: meteor npm run test:unit && meteor npm run test:packages
scripts.test:coverage: meteor npm run test:unit:coverage && meteor npm run test:packages:coverage
scripts.test:unit:coverage: TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_HTML=1 COVERAGE_OUT_LCOVONLY=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$(pwd)/ meteor test --once --driver-package meteortesting:mocha --raw-logs
scripts.test:packages:coverage: TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_HTML=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=$(pwd)/ meteor test-packages --once --driver-package=meteortesting:mocha --raw-logs
